question: am in my 28th week , had my sugar level tested . before fasting it was 84 and after fasting it was 140. the normal range was shown below 140 . and i belive am normal as i stay at 140.. but my doctor has advised me to take insulin 3 units from now before breakfast, and cme for sugar test again after 3 weeks .why is this been prescribed to take insulin am concerned, can any one advise plz
title: gestational diabetes
